envSDM 0.2.0
  • Reference

Create a .png from a .tif

Source: R/png_from_tif.R
png_from_tif.Rd

Used within prep_sdm to save png of density raster with presences

Usage

png_from_tif(
  x,
  title = NULL,
  dots = NULL,
  trim = TRUE,
  out_png = NULL,
  do_gc = FALSE
)

Arguments

x

spatRaster or path to .tif

title

Character. Title to add to the .png

dots

sf. Usually presences. Added as points.

trim

Logical. Run terra::trim() before writing to .png?

out_png

Character. Name of .png file to save. If NULL will be the same file name as terra::sources(x) with the file type as .png

do_gc

Logical. Run base::rm(list = ls) and base::gc() at end of function? Useful when running SDMs for many, many taxa, especially if done in parallel.

Value

invisible(NULL). out_png written.
